text: 2:11 Ua Me Ini 20:13-14; Godɨn Araziba 5:17-18; Rom 13:9E fo, God kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ia poroghamiba uari bakeir arazim damuan markɨ.” Egha a uaghan kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ia gumazamizibav soghtɨma me arɨmɨghiran markɨ.” Eghtɨ ia poroghamiba uari bakeir arazim damuan koghɨva, egh ia gumazitam mɨsueghtɨ an aremegham, kamaghɨn ia Moses Osirizir Araziba abɨzir gumazamizibar otifi.
